rev::LogRecord Class Reference

Holds the attributes associated with a log message. Instances are passed to the "output" method of AbstractLogHandler subclasses. More...

Detailed Description

Holds the attributes associated with a log message. Instances are passed to the "output" method of AbstractLogHandler subclasses.

Member Function Documentation

◆ category()

const GString& rev::LogRecord::category ( ) const
inline

The category for the message.

The category is usually the full namespace name of a class where the message emanated from.
